body:
Hello. Im notal

Pros: Sword, rushing
Cons: Bow

I can 1v1 you on badlion /duel or anything you want :p

I beat the majority of people i play. 1600 elo if you were wondering

replies.body:
aha cute kid saying u w0t. trying to be the cool kid. lol srub i know u can not peevpee but join BC. when i pvp u i win i say ezpz mod say tru u cri in hole mod ban you bcuz u
a kid. kid no allow on pvp. u cannot spell Nostal i see that is mistake of 1 yer old. gg no re. wen i see in-game i gonna shrek u. evry1 watching me combo on u.  owner give me  op  i very very happy i has the rite to ban u. u ez skittle. u cant fite since u liek 1d
haaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhh no but srs i no see foeture in u. u wont cm far efn with gamemode. u no able to keel me. nvr. i mean nvr say nvr babe. justin bieber power i gus.  ovr 10 yer u wil see me again. i say good old times. u just ignore me go bak to corner and cri that causes flood. u go jail since u made flood. i 1v1 police i win police no hit me once. i save  u vrom popo. i infite u to a 1v1 vite. i very weird brain wen i see u toching me. iwaslike omg he final hit me!!1111!! u was happiest person on world. hahahahhhaahaha after that i got combo on background u heard my blabalbla hurts. sound from pvp gods. and sunrise728. then zeus came i was like are there 2 ZEUSES. Aprently yes. zeus449 want 1v1 u. u think ezpz, but u no kow he god of  liteing. he lite on u. u electic notal. 1 prson try atak u. he touch u. he got shock. i say gf
owner yell w-w have u see dat notal won. every1 hapy to see u hapy. thy gif u  mod. u got happy more. then it was joke i demot u. ever1 is liek what happen!!~! why notal demote? i say cus i was no joking. ever1 say notal so bad he big scrub bad pvp. 10 yer later i found u lost in forest. u look very not nice. i ask what hapen? u say nothin
but that is u. u rly scare to say dings. i bichslap u. i look weird since u did no cri. i ask u why u no cri. u say "i am strong man now". i was like sure. a lost man wit no biseps and no leg is stronk. u say. i watch bajan he god peevpee. power moves only
mod in chat say true. i say dat wat she say. den sum1 wit rank noob says why do she say that? i very mad on him. i say shut up. he said uwotm8 fite me skid. i got tune on my phone wit Ohoh repoop alert. he got imidated by dat.  i leik ask raw soup or pot
he was like omg do soup i stimpy boyfriend. evr1 on server was lik "ok who cares"
he expected hate much hate. but we good server. ok lets go bak to fite. i no need for hotkey. i use trackpad. effn wit tat i win fite. oh i forgot i has admin. and i forgot notal. yes notal. the guy who cries in corner. by the cornfield. in the corner. in the corner
i see new music for tat sentenc3. u see that i use "3" inseed of "e" that show my cool i am. i got promote owner. he gaf me consolew!1!!!!1!11  i ban every1 end efn the staff!!!11 expect for notal. i need to do sumthing with him. remember kids. jozz has noodles in pants. he said in chat. i has noodles in pants admin u better watch out. u prob think y he stil onlien? becooz i no whitelist he new player. that sentence mate me promot him to head-admin!!1!!!. oh yea i say that i doin things with notal. what will i do? u will not know ever. remember kids he is ez

(Reads it again. Totally not funny at all)

replies.body:
What the fuck did you just fucking say about me, you little bitch? I’ll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Navy Seals, and I’ve been involved in numerous secret raids on Al-Quaeda, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in gorilla warfare and I’m the top sniper in the entire US armed forces. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the Internet? Think again, fucker. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You’re fucking dead, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways, and that’s just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the United States Marine Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little “clever” comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn’t, you didn’t, and now you’re paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You’re fucking dead, kiddo.

Not copypasta at all
